casebody.data:
Second Department,

September, 1953.

(September 4, 1953.) In the Matter Isaac Levine et al., Appellants, against Joseph Straus et al., Respondents.

Order affirmed, without costs. No opinion. Leave to appeal to the Court of Appeals granted. Nolan, P. J., Adel, Wenzel, MacCrate and Schmidt, JJ., concur.
